
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_library(libs-poco-MongoDB)
target_compile_options(libs-poco-MongoDB PRIVATE
  -DPOCO_ENABLE_CPP11
  -DPOCO_ENABLE_CPP14
  -DPOCO_NO_AUTOMATIC_LIBS
  -DPOCO_UNBUNDLED
  -DPOCO_OS_FAMILY_UNIX
  -DPOCO_HAVE_FD_EPOLL
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)
target_include_directories(libs-poco-MongoDB PUBLIC
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/MongoDB/include
)
target_include_directories(libs-poco-MongoDB PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/Foundation/include
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/MongoDB/src
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/Net/include
)
target_link_libraries(libs-poco-MongoDB PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  libs-poco-Foundation
  libs-poco-Net
)
target_sources(libs-poco-MongoDB PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/MongoDB/src/Array.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/MongoDB/src/Binary.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/MongoDB/src/Connection.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/MongoDB/src/Cursor.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/MongoDB/src/Database.cpp

  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/MongoDB/src/Document.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/MongoDB/src/Element.cpp

  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/MongoDB/src/InsertRequest.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/MongoDB/src/JavaScriptCode.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/MongoDB/src/KillCursorsRequest.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/MongoDB/src/Message.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/MongoDB/src/MessageHeader.cpp
